column8: Reserves for Argentina, Australia, Brazil, China, the United States, and “Other countries” were revised based on company and Government reports.
Reserves for Argentina, Australia, Brazil, China, the United States, and “Other countries” were revised based on company and Government reports.

For Australia, Joint Ore Reserves Committee-compliant or equivalent reserves were 4.8 million tons. Reserves for Argentina, Australia, Brazil, China, the United States, and “Other countries” were revised based on company and Government reports.
